member.name: ISharingConfigurationManager.ArePrintersShared
member.summary: Determines whether any printers connected to this computer are shared.

returns.para: Returns standard HRESULT values, including the following:

listheader.description: No printers capable of being shared were found.

member.name: ISharingConfigurationManager.CreateShare
member.summary: Shares the Users or Public folder. If the folder is already shared, this method updates its sharing status.
member.param: One of the values that indicates the folder to share or update.

param.name: role
param.para: One of the following values that sets the access permissions of the share for the Everyone ACE. CreateShare accepts only these values.
Read-only. The contents of the folder can be read, but not altered or added to.
Read/Write. The contents of the folder can be read, changed, or added to.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The role parameter specifies a value other than SHARE_ROLE_READER or SHARE_ROLE_CO_OWNER.

member.name: ISharingConfigurationManager.DeleteShare
member.summary: Removes sharing from either the Users or Public folder.
member.param: One of the values that specifies the folder to no longer share.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISharingConfigurationManager.GetSharePermissions
member.summary: Gets the access permissions currently associated with the User or Public folder for the Everyone access control entry (ACE).
member.param: One of the values that specifies the folder.
A pointer to a value that, when this method returns successfully, receives one of the values that indicate the sharing permissions set for the folder specified in the dsid parameter.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISharingConfigurationManager.ShareExists
member.summary: Queries whether the Users or Public folder is shared.
member.param: One of the values that indicates the folder whose sharing state is being checked.
member.returns: S_OK if the folder is shared; otherwise, S_FALSE.

member.name: ISharingConfigurationManager.SharePrinters
member.summary: Shares all local printers connected to a computer, enabling them to be discovered by other computers on the network.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISharingConfigurationManager.StopSharingPrinters
member.summary: Stops sharing all local, shared printers connected to a computer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISharingConfigurationManager
member.summary: Exposes methods that set and retrieve information about a computer's default sharing settings for the Users (C:\Users) or Public (C:\Users\Public) folder. Also exposes a set of methods that allow control of printer sharing.
